bibl.title: Gus Bendjus et al. v. Territory of Washington. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Territory of Wash. vs Gus Bendjus Et al. Subpoena. Returned and filed this 7th day of May A.D. 1888. HM Sutton, clerk. Viddette Print, Montsano, W. T.
by exhibiting and reading the same to each of them. J.H. Turner, Sheriff of Pacific County
Fees: Serving on 2 witnesses, at 40c...80. Mileage 4.0 miles, at 15...6.0. 6.80
Territory of Washington, Second Judicial District.}

To Al Harris, Fred Colbert, and Jon Church In the Name of the United States of America, you are hereby required to appear at the Court House in Montesano, on the 15th day of May, 1888, at 9 o'clock in the forenoon to give evidence in a certain cause, wherein Territory of Washington Plantiff, and Guss Bendjus Et al Defendant, on the part of Plantiff
Witness Frank Allyn, Esquire, Judge of the District Court of the Secon Judicial District of Washington Territory, this 28th day of April, A.D. 1888.
